unit, will be leaving, CEO Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to employees Wednesday. Startup Virtual Iron has a maturing virtual server technology that is making inroads with customers and providing a challenge to VMWare. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. - Sirius XM shock jock Howard Stern ripped into Jay Leno , accusing him of stealing material for "The Tonight Show," in an interview scheduled to air Tuesday night, the New York Post reported Monday. That brings us to the second problem with Chrome OS. It's going to be a tough sell. Eric Schmidt added to the spin via his blog, with a post a week after the delay: Welcome to the latest chapter of an epic journey in computing. Welcome to Chrome OS. Welcome to what, exactly?
